goal: Set up email digest and task management workers
success_criteria: Daily email digest running automatically, classifying emails correctly

features.title: Configure email accounts
features.description: Add email accounts to settings/email/accounts.json for the digest worker to access
acceptance_criteria: accounts.json exists with at least one account
Account has name, email, and provider fields
Provider is one of: gmail, outlook, imap

features.title: Customize email worker
features.description: Update email worker settings to match your schedule and preferences
acceptance_criteria: worker.yaml has correct schedule (morning or evening)

features.title: Run first email digest
features.description: Execute email worker manually and generate first digest to verify setup
